[5.00] [dishwasher] Samsung | Caps: switch, execute, ocf (+24 more) | State: main(switch=off)
Planner plan: 1. Check the current operating state of the dishwasher using the capability `dishwasherOperatingState`.
2. If the dishwasher is off, use the `switch` capability to turn it on.
3. If needed, use the `execute` capability to send any specific commands to the dishwasher (e.g., start a cycle).
4. Optionally, check the `dishwasherOperatingProgress` to monitor the current progress of the dishwasher.
Planner notes: The command "dishwasher" is quite broad, so I will first check the operating state of the dishwasher to determine if it needs to be turned on or if any specific actions are required.
